channel.title: CiTR -- Sexy In Van City
channel.description: Sexy In Van City is a talk show dedicated to developing your sexual and relational health. It features Sexual Health Educator, Julia Saunders and Dating Expert, Caroline MacGillivray as they work to quench your search for responsible, progressive sexuality and relating over your life span. Every Wednesday at 10pm for your listening pleasure, on CiTR 101.9 on the FM dial, live streaming audio at www.citr.ca or download a podcast anytime from www.juiceboxradio.com!
channel.itunes:summary: Sexy In Van City is a talk show dedicated to developing your sexual and relational health. It features Sexual Health Educator, Julia Saunders and Dating Expert, Caroline MacGillivray as they work to quench your search for responsible, progressive sexuality and relating over your life span. Every Wednesday at 10pm for your listening pleasure, on CiTR 101.9 on the FM dial, live streaming audio at www.citr.ca or download a podcast anytime from www.juiceboxradio.com!
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Dedicated to developing your relational and individual sexual health.

Women of Worth: Wellness & Self Esteem
TCM in Today's Fast Food Culture
item.description:
Tonight's show focuses on finding wellness in our sexuality and relationships in todays fast food culture. As health concerns such as impotence, prostate health and women's sexual health issues no longer front page but mainstream media, perhaps examing different ways to embrace wellness into our lives might be beneficial for all of us.
Special guest, Kevin Scrimgeour & I will discuss the Books focused on the early ideas relating to the tao of sex and TCM books about sex, basic techniques to enhance sexual energy and taoist tantric sex practice. TCM benefits the whole person spiritually, emotionally and physically. By engaging in practices that benefit one's well being, this practice will also benefit one's sexual and relational aspects.
Other tangents include discussion regarding the difference between modern trends in sex and ancient ideas of sex as a way to intimacy and ultimately to spiritual enlightenment if not abundant health.
item.itunes:subtitle: TCM in Today's Fast Food Culture

item.title: Every Woman in The World with Founder Kerri Carleson
item.description: Sexy in Vancity is about all things in Vancouver. Being sexy starts with how you feel about yourself. Every Woman in the World founder, Kerri Carleson with Caroline MacGillivray about creating opportunities for women who "move". The back to back intensive Every Woman events get women to try new activities including fitness, finances, goal setting, balance and sensuality. www.everywomanintheworld.ca.

item.title: LSD: love, sex, & death new piece from Kokoro Dance
item.description:
MARCH 12 - 21 2010, MORE THAN DANCE
The Vancouver International Dance Festival celebrates its 10th Anniversary March 11 to 21, 2009 with performances at the Roundhouse and the Playhouse and workshops at Harbour Dance Centre and EDAM.
Caroline chats to VIDF Executive Director,Jay Hirabayashi and Artistic Director, Barbara Bourget about Kokoro Dance's LSD (Love Sex and Death) and how dance (particularly Butoh) has been received by Vancouver & International audiences in the past 10 years. Discussion regarding upcoming festival highlights, Butoh, and working with your partner (Barbara & Jay have worked and been together for over 30 years) successfully.

item.title: Amazing Women's Weekend: Margo Dalinghaus
item.description:
We are very excited to announce that we will be hosting another AMAZING WOMENS WEEKEND this Spring on:
MARCH 27TH AND 28TH, 2010
Spring forward in your life! This fun and action packed weekend evokes change.
The Amazing Womens Weekend is a comprehensive, powerful and transformative retreat in beautiful Vancouver BC. Participants come from around the world to learn all they need to know about creating and sustaining a life of love and happiness in their personal lives and relationships/marriages. Education provided is all research based and aimed at making your experience as meaningful as possible. High energy, interactive accelerated learning processes ensure that you will have tons of fun and also serve to guarantee dramatic and lasting change for success.
You will:
Amazing Women's WeekendDiscover an in - depth and experiencial understanding of love and relationships that will bring you positive and permanent change for more happiness NOW.
Clarify and manifest what your want in your own life personally to be truly happy and accept yourself as a woman so that you do not look solely to the men in your life to bring you fulfillment and joy.
Change deep rooted perceptions, attitudes and behaviors that sabotage your personal success and ruin perfectly good relationships.
Learn the fundamental differences between men and women and unbelievable secrets that really work with men to transform your communication, connection and passion like never before.
Be astounded and empowered by the magic that occurs when a group of AMAZING WOMEN come together in the hopes of creating more love and happiness for self, relationships and the world at large.
Feel energized, inspired, motivated, validated, supported, cared for, loved, connected, empowered, challenged, free, confident, hopeful, real, alive, on fire.... and so much more!!
Amazing Women's Weekend
EMBRACE YOUR REALITY DISCOVER YOUR DREAMS MAKE CHANGE LOVE LIFE AND RELATIONSHIPS LIKE NEVER BEFORE
Contact Margo Dalinghaus by March 1st, 2010 to receive the
EARLY BIRD offer of: $325
By March 15th, 2010 to receive the REGULAR AMAZING WOMENS WEEKEND TUITION of: $375
Note: REGISTRATION CLOSES MARCH 15TH, 2010.
CONTACT MARGO VIA EMAIL AT: mdcoach@shaw.ca to register now!!
We look forward to witnessing your transformation!!
Margo Dalinghaus and the Liberty Education Team Liberty Education www.libertyforsuccess.com Check us out for more information...

item.title: Real Life V Day Warrior: Dave Dickson
item.description:
With the upcoming V Day ( V-Day is a global movement to stop violence against women and girls. V-Day is a catalyst that promotes creative events to increase awareness, raise money and revitalize the spirit of existing anti-violence organizations. V-Day generates broader attention for the fight to stop violence against women and girls, including rape, battery, incest, female genital mutilation (FGM) and sexual slavery. Through V-Day campaigns, local volunteers and college students produce annual benefit performances of The Vagina Monologues, A Memory, A Monologue, A Rant and A Prayer, and screenings of V-Day's documentary Until The Violence Stops, to raise awareness and funds for anti-violence groups within their own communities.
The 'V' in V-Day stands for Victory, Valentine and Vagina.), Sexy in Vancity host chats to Dave Dickson, Vancouver's DTES ending violence against women crusader. Talking about the evolution of the DTES, addiction and sexual violence, have we made progress in the DTES? What is the answer to ending violence against women in our own back yard?
Dave Dickson Born and raised in Vancouver area, joined the Vancouver Police Department in May,1980 and ended up becoming an Advocate for Street workers and youth, spent his entire career working in the Downtown Eastside, over the last 6 years has received a number of awards listed below:
2003-Recognition Award from Native Health Society 2004-Police Officer of the Year 2004-Federal Justice Dept. Award for working with Youth 2004-International Safety Award for working to keep High Risk Women safe 2005-City of VancouverYouth Ally Award 2005-Solicitor Generals Community Policing Award 2006-B.C.Civil Liberties Award 2006-Queens Jubilee Medal for Community Policing 2006-Premiers B.C.Community Achievement Award

item.title: Dating & Marrying the Ethnic Man with Dr. Faizal H Sahukhan PhD.
item.description: Dr. Faizal H Sahukhan, author Dating the Ethnic Man Strategies for Success provides a blue print for a healthy relationship with an ethnic man. We touch on the hows, whys and what of how to gage if your ethnic man is the ethnic man for you. If he is for you, how do you marry him - happily?

item.title: Body Image & Sexuality
item.description: Caroline MacGillivray chats to Shelley's Angel Founder & Professional Counseller, Shelley Jensen about how sexuality can hinder and sometimes hurt body image. Discussion covers tips on how parents and partners can guide someone experiencing body image issues towards accessing resources to build healthy self esteem and stronger relationships. Other topics touch on the orgins of Shelley's Angels & how fashion can be used as a healthy way to celebrate body image and self acceptance.

item.description:
Laurel Irons, program coordinator of the Mobile Access Project that helps survival sex working in Vancouver's DTES chats to Caroline MacGillivray about survival sex, MAP's 5th Birthday, how women get into the sex trade, who are sex workers, and much more.
The second half of the show follows Mandy Wong, Aly-Khan Virani, two SFU students who spearheaded today's round table discussion about the sex trade - to legalize, decriminalize what are the options?
